info.name: AI Ticket Creator Backend API - Complete (Latest Architecture)
info.description:
Complete API collection for AI-powered ticket creation and management system with modern multi-agent architecture, comprehensive member management, and extensive integrations.

## üîê Authentication Setup for Postman Testing

### **Step 1: Get Clerk JWT Token**
1. Open your frontend application in a browser
2. Log in with your Clerk account
3. Open browser developer console (F12)
4. Run: `await window.Clerk.session.getToken()`
5. Copy the returned JWT token
6. Set it as `CLERK_JWT_TOKEN` in Postman environment

### **Step 2: Generate API Key**
1. Use the "Generate API Key for Testing" request
2. This exchanges your Clerk JWT for a long-lived API key
3. The API key is automatically saved as `ACCESS_TOKEN`
4. Use this API key for all subsequent requests

### **Alternative: Use Existing API Token Management**
- Use the `/api/v1/api-tokens` endpoints to manage API keys
- Generate tokens with custom names and permissions
- Revoke tokens when no longer needed

## Key Features

### üßë‚Äçüíº Member Management
- **Role-Based Access Control**: Admin and Member roles with proper permission enforcement
- **Invitation System**: Secure token-based invitations with expiration tracking
- **Organization Discovery**: Automatic domain-based organization matching
- **Security Controls**: Self-role modification prevention, last admin protection
- **Auto-Admin Promotion**: Intelligent admin promotion when needed
- **Cross-Organization Isolation**: Complete data isolation between organizations

### ü§ñ AI Agent System
- **Multi-Agent Architecture**: Multiple specialized agents per organization
- **Rich Configuration**: 20+ typed configuration fields for precise agent behavior
- **Change History**: Complete audit trail with rollback capabilities
- **File Context Integration**: Process up to 20 files per agent for enhanced context
- **Avatar Management**: Dedicated avatar upload/management system
- **Task Processing**: Queue-based autonomous task handling

### üí¨ Agent-Centric Chat
- **Thread Management**: Create, update, delete conversation threads per agent
- **Context-Aware AI**: Agents use their specific configuration and file context
- **Real-time Processing**: WebSocket support for live conversations
- **Title Generation**: AI-powered thread title suggestions
- **Message History**: Full conversation history with search and filtering

### üìÅ Enhanced File Attachment System
- **Smart URL Structure**: Fully qualified URLs with filenames (https://domain.com/api/v1/files/{id}/storage/filename.ext)
- **Intelligent Content-Disposition**: Images, PDFs, and text files render inline; others download automatically
- **Standardized Format**: Both messages and tickets use consistent [{'file_id':'uuid'}] attachment format
- **Universal File Upload**: Support for documents, images, audio, and video files with enhanced serving
- **AI Content Extraction**: PyMuPDF document parsing, Tesseract OCR, Whisper transcription
- **Unified JSON Storage**: All extracted content in structured extracted_context field
- **Background Processing**: Non-blocking AI processing with status tracking
- **Organization Scoping**: Multi-tenant file isolation and access control
- **Independent Upload**: Files uploaded separately, then associated with tickets/threads
- **Cascade Deletion**: Files automatically deleted when threads/tickets are removed
- **Orphan Cleanup**: Administrative tools for managing unreferenced files
- **Backward Compatibility**: Legacy /content endpoints preserved during transition

### üé´ Advanced Ticketing
- **AI-Powered Creation**: Natural language ticket creation with context analysis
- **File-Enhanced AI**: Ticket categorization using file content analysis
- **Standardized Attachments**: Consistent [{'file_id':'uuid'}] format for all file associations
- **Multi-Stage Workflow**: Status management with rich metadata
- **File Association**: Attachments array for flexible file-ticket relationships
- **Integration Routing**: Automatic routing to appropriate external systems
- **Analytics & Stats**: Comprehensive reporting and performance metrics
- **Cascade Cleanup**: Files automatically deleted when tickets are removed

### üîó Integration Platform
- **Category-Based System**: 7 functional categories (ticketing, CRM, messaging, etc.)
- **Platform Identification**: Support for JIRA, Salesforce, GitHub, Slack, Teams, Zoom
- **Automatic Status Management**: Smart status handling and health monitoring
- **Field Discovery**: Dynamic field mapping for JIRA and other systems
- **Testing & Validation**: Built-in connection testing and validation

### üë• User Management
- **Avatar System**: User avatar upload with multiple sizes and caching
- **Profile Management**: Comprehensive user profile with preferences
- **Organization Context**: Full organization membership and role management

## Authentication Architecture
- **Frontend Users**: Authenticate via Clerk (OAuth/SSO providers)
- **API Testing**: Use Clerk JWT ‚Üí API Key exchange for long-lived tokens
- **Service-to-Service**: Direct API key authentication
- **Hybrid Support**: System validates both Clerk JWTs and API keys

## Environment Variables
Key variables for testing:
- `BASE_URL`: API base URL (default: http://localhost:8000)
- `CLERK_JWT_TOKEN`: JWT from Clerk frontend authentication
- `API_KEY`: Long-lived API key for testing (auto-generated)
- `ACCESS_TOKEN`: Current token (auto-populated with API key)
- `USER_ID`, `ORGANIZATION_ID`: User context (auto-populated)
- Integration credentials for external system testing

## Base URL
- **Local Development**: http://localhost:8000
- **API Documentation**: http://localhost:8000/docs
- **Health Check**: http://localhost:8000/health
